segments.text: The scene in the kitchen is straightforward: woman at sink, kids nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet running, sink full, water starting to spill over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She holds a plate, towel in hand, eyes on her work.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle on floor, her shoe wet, but no change in her stance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on stool in front of open cabinet, hand in cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool legs spread unevenly, balance off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl stands close, arm up toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked on counter, waiting to be put away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window open to garden path and bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains pulled back, light filling the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No one seems alarmed by the water or the climb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all unfolding quietly despite the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar sits prominently, half-empty now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, a typical moment captured in motion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool worries me a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR
